bropals.lib.simplegame.gui

Class GuiElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiButton, GuiImage, GuiProgressBar, GuiText

    public abstract class GuiElement
extends java.lang.Object
    The superclass for all GUI elements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GuiElement(int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Creates a GUI element with the specified size and position.

        public void mouseInput(int x,
              int y)
        Sends mouse input to this GuiElement. Must call super() if overriden.
        Parameters:
        x - the x mouse position
        y - the y mouse position

        public boolean contains(int x,
               int y)
        Sees if the point is inside of this GuiElement
        Parameters:

        y - the y position of the point
        Returns:
        if the point is inside this GuiElement.

      • update

        public void update(int mouseX,
          int mouseY)
        Updates the GUI element. This method does not need to call super()
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the current x position of the mouse
        mouseY - the current y position of the mouse

      • render

        public abstract void render(java.lang.Object graphicsObject)
        Renders this GuiElement.
        Parameters:
        graphicsObject - the graphics object for drawing
